body: Is that Bantu on the first page?
Tiki is definitely top waifu material. My #1 Awakening girl.
@佐倉ほむら After finishing her S-class support/marrying her I easily put her above the 3 you mentioned(Lucina/Cordelia fanboy here). The feels man.

@Crossangel I normally like my lolis, but I always didn't like loli Tiki just because she's soo... a 90s generic style loli... Comparatively, Nono had a more interesting loli personality than her. That's why when they brought her back but as an adult, my opinion of her vastly improved. There's something about a girl who's cute and who can potentially be sexy, gets all grown up that drives me wild. Especially if they go from a childish nature to a more mature nature. This is why she may not be as bae as top favs like Lucina, Tharja, or Cordelia.. but she's definitely not a weak contender at all.

Something about Tiki I just always found fascinating. The idea of a incredibly beautiful woman whose kind of childish yet serene is so amazing. Here though, they really take advantage of how hot she is.
